title: Pablo Escobar's brother threatens to 'take down' Elon Musk in flamethrower row
text:
Pablo Escobar’s brother has vowed to “take down” Elon Musk after the Tesla founder started selling a flamethrower which Mr Escobar says he and his brother designed.

Roberto Escobar, the 72-year-old former accountant for his drug trafficker brother, has made a career in recent years out of cashing in on the family’s infamous name.

On Thursday Olof Gustafsson, the CEO of Escobar Inc, Mr Escobar’s marketing website, announced that they had won a “cyber squatting” battle for the rights to the website escobarinc.com.

Documents from the arbitrator, based in Minneapolis, The Forum, show that they ruled against the owner of escobarinc.com, who had been demanding $3 million from Mr Escobar for the rights to the website.

Mr Gustafsson said that, from next year, the website will start selling “a range of official Pablo Escobar products and merchandise”.

It is not the first time Mr Escobar has fought for his family name.
description: Pablo Escobar’s brother has vowed to “take down” Elon Musk after the Tesla founder started selling a flamethrower which Mr Escobar says he and his brother designed.
